creator: js@nw3.dk
text:
Forget the original "bug" report, which turned out to be a missppelled parameter.

However FOP do not write out the footer on two ocations.When an list or table fills more than one page, the footer is NOT written (or its height is 1 point).

When using a background-color on the block in the xsl.refion-after, only a thin colored line are drawn on these ocations.

The second problem is commonly caused by defining a region-body overlapping
the region-after. Specifying an appropriate margin-bottom on the region-body
fixes this. Without a test case, there isnt more I can do.
